desc: Limited edition screenprint t-shirt designs, accessories, & gifts

layout.text:
"Wear what you want to say!"
We make tee shirts for men and women in unisex sizes small-3X.
All shirts are soft style.
Hundreds of designs for $12! *standard tees size small-XL.
2X + $2 and 3X + $4

**Please keep in mind that colors of designs and shirts may vary based on lighting and computer/phone settings. **
